alert.note: Alert for Hardin; Southern Jasper (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Flood Watch issued January 28 at 8:02PM CST until further notice by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Lake Charles LA has issued a Flood Watch for the following rivers in Texas... Neches River Near Evadale Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued late tonight at 415 AM CST. && ...FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY AFTERNOON UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Flooding is possible. * WHERE...Neches River near Evadale. * WHEN...From Thursday afternoon until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 17.0 feet, Minor flooding expected with the boat ramps at Evadale possibly becoming inaccessible. Flooding can be expected in the low-lying areas of the Lakeview community in Orange County. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:00 PM CST Sunday the stage was 16.5 feet. - Forecast...Flood stage may be reached early Thursday afternoon. - Flood stage is 17.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
